summary: Xiaomi, founded in 2010, focuses on creating affordable, innovative products globally. With a mission to deliver heartfelt, budget-friendly tech, Xiaomi emphasizes technology, value, and cool products. Future strategies include redefining entrepreneurship, integrating Internet with manufacturing, and ensuring steady progress. Xiaomi aims to inspire innovation, shape smart living, boost Chinese manufacturing, and impact lives worldwide in the next decade. Xiaomi envisions a future where engineering meets creativity, smart living transforms lifestyles, and Chinese manufacturing rises, driving towards a brighter global future.
